title: **-- QUEEN BED FITS -- HIGH CEILINGS -- DOORMAN BUILDING -- LAUNDRY ON
posting_body: ['**-- QUEEN BED FITS -- HIGH CEILINGS -- DOORMAN BUILDING -- LAUNDRY ON SITE --**', 'Listing ID #: 212818', 'Price: $3,300', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: 1.0', 'Bathrooms: 1.0', 'Building Amenities', 'Concierge', 'Doorman', 'Elevator', 'Health Club', 'Laundry', 'Lounge', 'Roof Deck', 'WiFi', 'Apartment Amenities', 'City View', 'Granite Kitchen', 'Hardwood', 'High Ceilings', 'Light', 'Marble Bath', 'Open View', 'Renovated', 'STUNNING CONVERTIBLE STUDIO TO 1 BEDROOM!!', 'THIS SIZEABLE STUDIO HOLDS ENOUGH SPACE TO CONVERT EASILY TO A 1 BEDROOM UNIT, WITH ENOUGH SPACE FOR A QUEEN BED!', 'Other building amenities include: Private Fitness Center Rooftop Deck Resident Lounge Laundry Room Storage Available', 'Located in the heart of the Financial District, this building is within walking distance to the South Street Seaport, Brookfield Place, and all major subway lines (1,2,3,A,C,E,Path train)', 'Contact Anthony today to book an appointment!', 'Call/text @ 917 721 3315 or Email:', '<URL>', 'Anthony Bernard', 'Phone: (212) 402-7855', 'Mobile: 9177213315', 'Fax: (212) 402-7856', 'Email: <URL>', 'The Bouklis Group \xa0 (212) 402-7855 \xa0 9177213315 \xa0 FAX (212) 402-7856 \xa0 <URL>', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text Anthony Bernard at 9177213315']
